alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Kittson; West Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:57PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marshall, north central Polk, south central Kittson and northwestern Pennington Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1157 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florian, or 32 miles northwest of Thief River Falls, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stephen, Argyle, Newfolden, Viking, Holt, Strandquist and Florian. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
